SELECT p.paper_no paperNo , p.student_no studentNo , p.question_no questinoNo , p.answer , q.test_no testNo , q.question_idx questionIdx , q.question_title questionTitle , e.example_ox exampleOx FROM paper p INNER JOIN question q ON p.question_no = q.question_no INNER JOIN example e ON e.question_no = p.question_no AND e.example_idx = p.answer
AND q.test_no = #{testNo} AND p.student_no = #{studentNo}
